Tap_Type_and_Enter.name: Tap_Type_and_Enter
Tap_Type_and_Enter.description: Tap an input box at position (x, y), Type the "text", and then perform the Enter operation (useful for searching or sending messages).
Tap_Type_and_Enter.precondition: There is a text input box on the screen.

Reopen_And_Select_Sort_Option.name: Reopen_And_Select_Sort_Option
Reopen_And_Select_Sort_Option.description: Reopen a dropdown menu at position (dropdown_x, dropdown_y) and select an option at position (option_x, option_y).
Reopen_And_Select_Sort_Option.precondition: A dropdown menu is present on the screen, and the desired option is visible after reopening the menu.

Access_Menu_Option.name: Access_Menu_Option
Access_Menu_Option.description: Tap a menu button at position (menu_button_x, menu_button_y) and then select an option at position (option_x, option_y).
Access_Menu_Option.precondition: A menu button is visible on the screen, and the desired option is accessible after tapping the menu button.

Swipe_To_Review_Content.name: Swipe_To_Review_Content
Swipe_To_Review_Content.description: Swipe from position (x1, y1) to position (x2, y2) to review additional content, such as menus or reviews, when the current screen does not display all relevant information.
Swipe_To_Review_Content.precondition: The current screen contains scrollable content, and additional information is expected to be revealed by swiping.

Swipe_And_Tap.name: Swipe_And_Tap
Swipe_And_Tap.description: Swipe from position (x1, y1) to position (x2, y2) and then tap at position (tap_x, tap_y). Useful for navigating to hidden elements that require scrolling before tapping.
Swipe_And_Tap.precondition: The desired element is not visible on the screen and requires swiping to reveal it before tapping.

Search_And_Call.name: Search_And_Call
Search_And_Call.description: Search for a specific term by tapping the search bar, typing the text, pressing Enter, and then tapping the 'Call' button to retrieve a phone number.
Search_And_Call.precondition: The app has a visible search bar at position (search_x, search_y), and a 'Call' button is present after the search results are displayed.

Locate_And_Open_App.name: Locate_And_Open_App
Locate_And_Open_App.description: Locate and open an app by tapping the 'Show more' button to reveal additional apps and then selecting the app icon.
Locate_And_Open_App.precondition: The desired app is not visible on the current screen, and a 'Show more' button is available to reveal additional apps.

Reopen_App_And_Search.name: Reopen_App_And_Search
Reopen_App_And_Search.description: Reopen an app from the home screen, navigate to the search interface, and perform a search for the specified text.
Reopen_App_And_Search.precondition: The app is accessible from the home screen, and the search interface can be reached by tapping a search icon and then a search bar.

Reopen_And_Search.name: Reopen_And_Search
Reopen_And_Search.description: Reopen an app, navigate to the search interface by tapping the search icon, and perform a search for the specified text.
Reopen_And_Search.precondition: The app is accessible from the home screen, and the search interface can be reached by tapping a search icon and then a search bar.

Reopen_And_Search_With_Enter.name: Reopen_And_Search_With_Enter
Reopen_And_Search_With_Enter.description: Reopen an app, navigate to the search interface by tapping the search icon, tap the search bar, type the search text, and press Enter to execute the search.
Reopen_And_Search_With_Enter.precondition: The app is accessible from the home screen, and the search interface can be reached by tapping a search icon and then a search bar.

Reopen_App_And_Execute_Search.name: Reopen_App_And_Execute_Search
Reopen_App_And_Execute_Search.description: Reopen an app, navigate to the search interface by tapping the search icon, tap the search bar, type the search text, and press Enter to execute the search.
Reopen_App_And_Execute_Search.precondition: The app is accessible from the home screen, and the search interface can be reached by tapping a search icon and then a search bar.
